name: Vivarium
summary:
Splash into Vivarium's new Summer Vacay update! 

📸 2 new features: Mailbox & Screenshot

🐊 3 new animals: Dwarf Caiman, Emperor Newt, Golden Tree Frog

🌴 7 new tropical plants

🎁 35+ beach-themed items & decorations (from surfboards to sandcastles!) and 1 new VIVARIUM sculpture

In Vivarium, craft lively vivariums and aquariums using natural and manmade elements in the new pet and plant simulator. Join hobbyists around the world in your new favorite...
